places_with_reviews.name: The Triangle Glamping (Camping Site near Pune)
address: Solu, Alandi-Markal Rd, behind Dosti Hotel, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Solu, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text:
Our stay at Triangle Glamping was amazing! From the moment we’ve arrived till we left everything was up to the point.

All meals were delicious and timely served. That too in private dining area.

Amazed by the staff, they were warm and welcoming and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was unforgettable. Whether it was for providing recommendations for nearby farm trails or arranging cozy bonfire under the stars, their hospitality truly made us feel like VIP guests.

Overall,
5 stars to the property and the service, will recommend to friends and family.

Nice place to celebrate birthday,anniversary. This place is near to city.atmosphere is very nice.food is also good. Please carry mosquito cream,as due to river side ,there is a lot of mosquito attack.

Best Place to hangout with Family for Birthday celebration. Privacy maintained Perfectly. Rooms are spacious and Neet n Clean. I like the most Games Area and Playing Options. One can't finish playing all games in the stat time. Must Visit, Thanks to Adinath n Dnyanesh for Best Service I Experienced. Surely visit again in Winter.

It was a overall a good experience here. Only drawback I would suggest is that you will encounter a lot of mosquitoes after evening and even if you apply odomos, you will get some mosquito bites but this is expected as it is beside river side and one has to prepare for it mentally. Also, the washroom for the Traingle AC tent can be improved as the shower and taps were very old and not functioning properly. I am sure for other new tents, the washroom is much better but for this particular tent, there is a scope for improvement. If you ignore these few drawbacks, overall the stay was very good and quite.

This place really ticked me off, It's not a kid friendly or pet friendly place.
Too many mosquitoes, this is actually just beside a swamp. All you'll see is just green algae grown to it's fullest contributing to all the insects.

Indoor game zone carrom board is broken, Foosball table handles are broken.

Things were explained at the time of check in. But nothing was served as per planned time unless we called the guy nothing came.

Cooler in the room was broken, flush tank does not fill properly. Rooms mentioned that are attached with a pool it's just a small tank

Drinking water which is termed filtered is not suitable for drinking.

Food that we ate lead to an upset tummy for all of us as a fly.

Not worth the cost honestly I would not recommend going here atleast with kids.

places_with_reviews.name: The Riverfront Resort & Camping
address: Solu, Alandi-Markal Rd, behind Dosti hotel, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Solu, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text:
Good location, good but limited food, worst possible service.
We booked 5 rooms but the guy was adamant that we had four.
The snacks were served sharp at 5, eat it or leave it,  is limited, no refills. No one to talk to at front desk.
Dinner at sharp 8, was unlimited.
Breakfast at 8, limited, one bread omelet ot one plate idly and that's it. Rest you pay extra.

They have a lot to catch up on the service front. Won't recommend to anyone.

The staff were exceptional, providing a fabulous experience for our bachelorette celebration. The stunning decorations added to the ambiance, making our evening truly memorable. We highly recommend this place and eagerly anticipate returning for future celebrations. Thank you so much for making our evening memorable 💖💖!!

It was not really that good. Recommended ONLY IF YOU are a nearby resident and looking for a low budgeted and quick celebrations

Hygiene was concern no. 1. Though clean but few of the equipments in the washroom was too old for our tent.

Then the hospitality was always questionable. Not all of the staff members are humble or polite enough to respond to you with gratitude.

Heavy load shedding issues.

Too many things were asked to carry from our end which should have been provided by the hosts at this price point.

Very limited food options.

The good parts - Very spacious, nice and well managed lawn, gaming options, clean swimming pool, room and event decoration at very reasonable price.

Recently visited Riverfront Resorts Perfect destination to spend peaceful time here.
Eye catching view and peaceful place which has 3 types of Cottage with attached washroom. Tent with Non Ac room.
No unnecessary crowd like other camps and you can enjoy your time peacefully.

Non veg Food quality was good.
Specially barbeque along with bonfire.
Nice place for celebrating anniversary & birthday.
Awesome place to stay...environment was nurturing. Foood taste's delicious. Service provided was remarkable. Perfect to celebrate special moments.

places_with_reviews.name: Goodluck Lunch Home 3 Moshi
address: Gat No. 164, New, Dehu - Alandi Rd, Sastewadi, Moshi, Pune, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text:
Must visit place ❤. Loved the quality of food.
So affordable .  Family has seperate section to o. Must try their chicken raan.

Very bad service. It is the stupidest restaurant I have ever seen. They don’t even Have the food which they have added in the menu I was gone for salad and so which was on their menu but they didn’t offer me. They said we just close that term and when I ordered Paneer tikka, they still not having that Even the person who should be a waiter, they were calling them captain And who are not even behaving with us properly they didn’t even give us the water they directly give us Bisleri water they they were not even having tap water
The only good thing was I ordered two chicken masala and he added one in the bill by mystically so it was good for us We get paid ₹200 less from the menu

This restaurant may be famous for non-vegetarian dishes. But unfortunately we had to eat vegetarian when we last visited. Vegetarian options were not that great. Bhakri was very hot served and really tasty. Please do not try vegetarian food here. It was crowded and many visited there for non-vegetarian food only. So may try that.

As the name suggests it's a lunch home with limited main courses, their main attraction is mutton thali in Maharashtrian style and it's worthy.  Manchurian was below average, veg curry was good and sufficient for two. their bhakri is too heavy even though one is enough. A better option for mutton lovers.

Must visit place for thali lovers. All dishes are prepared in ghee enhancing the taste & quality of food.
Would highly recommend visiting this place.

places_with_reviews.name: Emerald Tree Moshi
address: Gate No. 174 Dattanagar, Moshi - Alandi Rd, near Mangalam Society, Pune, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text:
Pathetic Experience. Hotel Staff was not Courteous. Major safety and security concerns in the Hotel rooms.
The Hotel provides only 1 Litre Drinking water as complimentary. Every next drinking water is chargeable at Rs.25/Litre. The Hot drinking water that i requested was also charged at Rs. 25/Litre. Somebody kept trying to unlock my room at night 2 am. This kept repeatedly happening every 15 minutes upto 3.30 am when i finally called the Reception and told them about this incidence.

I had booked this hotel via Treebo Trend. I called the Hotel to check if they had my booking. To my surprise the Hotel informed me that they are no more connected with Treebo Trend so they cannot accept the booking and that the Hotel was completely booked for the dates i wanted. I cancelled the booking made via Treebo Trend. Then i called the Hotel again to check if they had rooms available, to my surprise they said they had rooms available but the prices were higher. I booked the room anyways as i had no choice for the dates and had time constraints.

The pictures speak louder! Such horrible bedspread I’ve never seen. Treebo says they provide fresh sheets and this is what I got. The full bed picture is the changed sheet!!! There are no hangers inside wardrobe, there is no table to keep the intercom, it’s kept on the bed!
Pathetic rooms. Please avoid

Experienced the Bad stay here, there is no proper door mat, toilet mat, no proper flush, I ordered curd rice which wasn't good even a single percentage, AC remote wasn't working, I would never stay here again.

The hotel's facilities were top-notch. I enjoyed unwinding at the spa and staying active at the fitness center. Additionally, the hotel's central location made it convenient to explore local attractions and return to the comfort of Treebo Trend Emerald Tree Chakan at the end of the day.

The staff at the hotel was very polite, understanding and courteous. I need an extended stay as my flight was late night and was dealt with promptly without even been asked for. Will be staying again soon.

places_with_reviews.name: Shree Ashoka Veg
address: Pune - Alandi Rd, near Balaji Mandir, Wadmukhwadi, Charholi Budruk, Pune, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text: This is the best option for veg food (multi cuisine) on Pune Alandi Road near Dighi, Charholi and Wadmukhwadi area. Huge option in food and cold drinks. Food is quality and tasty with excellent service. Hige sitting and parking area. Small children play area is also there.

Food was very disappoting.Overall experience was bad.
We ordered Paneer kebab neither it was tasty nor properly roasted.Both curries were having same taste only with different name and price tag.Rotis were not properly cooked.
Staff was just lost.No coordination confused among themselves only.

The hotel's administration and service are poor. When we arrived at 4 p.m., we were advised to wait 15 minutes while our rooms were being cleaned; it has been an hour and they still can't check us in. When I arrived, they had stated that they had several rooms available, but now they were claiming that they only had one, which is equally unclear. There is no room cleaning.

The manager responded to our question in an impolite manner, and the staff refused to comply when we asked for room service or a cleaning.
Best party hall, food, service & very good decoration for shree Krishna event orgnizer

What I can say besstt hotel, Best Staff, Great food, good management, Good location. Staff, manager very helpful and polite..

Each and every guest was happy with the food quality...Everyone one enjoyed the food...

Thank you...
Highly recommended..

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ambience Inn
address: Dudulgoan phata, Moshi - Alandi Rd, Moshi, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text:
The room is clean and there is enough parking space hot water is 24hrs
Overall a good stay

Very great place this is for the stay!
Nice interior of the room gives us good feel!
Good service gives a good stay experience!
And that all for a very reasonable rate!
The place for Parking our vehicles is also sufficient spacious, and the hotel is just on the way, right beside the highway!
Si Good accessible!
A perfect place for stay in Alandi!

Room rates are high for the facilities they provide.Staff is helpful. There were no towels, no tissues, no bath or toilet soap, but got them fast on request. Food was reasonable, but they made vegetarian as per our request. Their yellow dal was very tasty. Had ordered poha for breakfast & they burnt the poha. They say they cater to corporate clients, I am not sure about the same.

Rooms are good & clean. It's a newly constructed hotel. Staff okay. Food items are restricted only for few items. Hotel owners does not seem to be much concerned about regular customers staying in this hotel on regular basis. Attachment of owners with regular customers need to be improved
Outside look is not good, building is in construction condition, rooms have more space and clean, food also good

places_with_reviews.name: OYO Hotel Shivay Executive Lodging & Boarding
address: Alandi Markal Road, Dhanore Phata, Dhanore, Pune, Maharashtra 412105, India

reviews.text: Property is situated near to Alandi and Markal road. We booked 3 rooms each at 1,200/- per night. Rooms are good having a double bed and attached bathroom. There is no kichen in hotel. However staff can arrange food from outside. Staff is polite. Thanks to Omkar and Surji for helping.

Stayed in Room 302, cockroaches. Had to get hit sprayed. Television of no use since only free channels.  Hot water a constraint,  had to regularly start geyser. Service very dicey. But ok for a day. Not for a longer duration.
Service was very good....and the room was very clean.
Very bad service this lodge not good this is not secured service boy are very bad
Location is way off as it is very far from the city. It is showing in OYO but there booking is done manually. It does not accept OYO bookings. Overall service was good.
